Strings.Text:
{scroll 2}There's a lever. Will you
move it?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There's a button. Will
you push it?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There was a sound from the
room next door.{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}There's a button. Will\nyou push it?{branch 0 1 1}{scroll 2}There was a sound from the\nroom next door.{scroll 2}
{scroll 2}There was a sound from the\nroom next door.{scroll 2}
